name: Labyrinth - Ancient Tournament
description:
Solve the ancient maze test, find the path through a difficult labyrinth in the best time.
For each mistake you lose the points, so think carefully every moves which you make.

Simple and fun ancient puzzle game against the real people.

Includes fantastic tournaments and head-to-head competitions with real cash prizes (where available).

Other places you can still play in multiplayer competitions with free virtual currency. (This not cost anything).

Play for FREE without irritating ads.

BASIC FEATURES:
• Very simple & easy.
• Find the correct path.
• Don't make any mistakes, this cost you points.
• Play Skillz Multiplayer Tournaments Against Other Users (Skillz.com)

STRATEGIC ELEMENTS!
• Who is master of the labyrinth!
• Solve the ancient labyrinth.
• Avoid the wrong path. This will cost points and time.

PLAY AGAINST REAL PLAYER!
• Play Head to Head game with other players or in large, multiplayer tournaments.
• In head to head games both players trying to find right path trouhg the labyrinth and player who finished with the most points win!
• Cash tournaments are available in about 75% of the world. If you don't live in a cash-enabled region, you can still play with virtual currency.
• Challenge people around the world with Skillz. Complete with leaderboards, trophies and an amazing loyalty program that rewards you just for playing.

INFO
If you have any questions or proposals to the game, we hope you contact us at support@ccbrothers.com
If you have any questions about the Skillz system or cash tournaments please contact: support@skillz.com
